English (Google Traslator)


The fourth part of the globally successful series of chess software "Fritz & Fertig" welcomes another, exciting chess adventure to his fans. This time black king needs help. In Internet chat he has boasted that he was "the best chess player of the universe." A few aliens make the informer to the test and kidnap him together with Fritz and Bianca on their planet Chessbase.

The three earthlings have to win the tournament against the chess enthusiasts green bodies to be released. Fortunate that the coach and chess expert Fred just finished making holiday on Chessbase and they can stand with clever tricks and cheeky comments on the page. A must for all small and big chess lovers and those who want to become.

From the contents:
Opening Training (Queens Gambit) / game analysis / Matt motives / tactics motifs (blockage clearing) / Strategy (space, time) / Final Training (Bauer breakthrough, yeoman) / draw strategies / chess variants (protest chess, dice chess), etc.

     The sequel to the award-winning chess-learning program "Fritz & Fertig"
     Advanced training: tactics and strategy, opening and endgame
     In this episode: Training by Matt strategies
     Developed in collaboration with experienced chess coaches youth
     Recommended by the German Chess Federation
     Based on the engine of "Fritz", the world chess software used by ChessBase
     Recommended for ages 8 years
     

Train to train to be listed on the parts Matt. Funny game of chess variants training skills.

System requirements: Multimedia PC with Pentium III processor, 32 MB RAM (16 MB of free memory), sound card, graphics card: 1024 x 768 pixels
at 32 bit color, CD-ROM drive, Windows Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® ME, XP, Vista
